comments.body: I'm not sure. I've started including it by default when writing CMake based builds based on the advice [here](https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/resources/compiler-tools.html?highlight=cmake#an-aside-on-cmake-and-sysroots).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@    # Fix up CMake for using conda's sysroot
    # See https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/resources/compiler-tools.html?highlight=cmake#an-aside-on-cmake-and-sysroots
    CMAKE_PLATFORM_FLAGS+=("-DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${RECIPE_DIR}/cross-linux.cmake")
else
    CMAKE_PLATFORM_FLAGS+=("-DCMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=${MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET}")
